questions.question: What is the primary purpose of ApeCoin in the Web3 economy?

options.A: To serve as the only currency for online transactions.
options.B: To support community-led initiatives that drive culture into the metaverse.
options.C: To replace traditional forms of governance with blockchain technology.
options.D: To provide a platform for gaming and entertainment only.

questions.fun_fact: ApeCoin is all about empowering a decentralized community to shape the future of digital culture.

questions.question: Who stewards the growth and development of the APE ecosystem?
questions.fun_fact: The APE Foundation acts as the base layer on which ApeCoin holders can build, not as an overseer.

questions.question: What does DAO stand for in the context of ApeCoin?
questions.fun_fact: DAOs are critical for decentralized governance, crucial to the success of globally dispersed communities.

questions.question: What exclusive access does ApeCoin provide?

options.A: Early access to all web3 games.
options.B: Exclusive games, merch, events, and services within its ecosystem.
options.D: Free transactions for all its holders.

questions.fun_fact: Holding ApeCoin unlocks parts of its ecosystem that are otherwise unavailable.

questions.question: How is ApeCoin's total supply managed?

options.A: It increases annually based on DAO decisions.
options.B: It decreases whenever a token is used for transactions.
options.C: It is permanently fixed with no capability for increase or decrease.
options.D: It is adjusted based on the performance of the ecosystem.

questions.fun_fact: With a total supply permanently fixed at 1 billion tokens, ApeCoin ensures scarcity and value retention.

questions.question: What is the role of the APE Foundation in relation to the ApeCoin DAO?

options.A: To control and make all decisions for the ApeCoin DAO.
options.B: To serve as an advisory board without any real power.
options.C: To administer the decisions of the ApeCoin DAO and support its day-to-day operations.
options.D: To create and sell ApeCoin exclusively.

questions.fun_fact: The APE Foundation serves as the administrative backbone, ensuring the ApeCoin DAO's visions come to fruition.

questions.question: How does ApeCoin aim to impact the web3 economy?

options.A: By becoming the exclusive cryptocurrency for all digital transactions.
options.B: By driving culture forward into the metaverse through community-led initiatives.
options.C: By replacing all other forms of digital currency.

questions.fun_fact: ApeCoin is a catalyst for cultural evolution in the web3 space, empowering creative and community-driven projects.

questions.question: What makes the ApeCoin DAO membership unique?

options.A: Membership is by invitation only from existing members.
options.B: It is open to all ApeCoin holders, democratizing governance.
options.C: Members must pass a test to join.
options.D: Membership comes with an annual fee.

questions.fun_fact: The inclusivity of ApeCoin DAO membership allows for a broad and diverse range of voices in its governance.

questions.question: What key governance feature does ApeCoin offer to its holders?

options.A: Voting rights on what color the next Bored Ape should be.
options.B: Deciding the salaries of the APE Foundation board members.
options.C: Voting on Ecosystem Fund allocations, governance rules, projects, and partnerships.
options.D: Choosing which cryptocurrencies to pair with ApeCoin on exchanges.

questions.fun_fact: Through governance features, ApeCoin holders have a direct impact on the ecosystemâ€™s development and direction.

questions.question: What fundamental principle underpins the ApeCoin DAO's approach to governance?

options.A: Centralized decision-making by a select few.
options.B: Random selection of proposals for implementation.
options.C: Decentralized governance to build and manage a globally dispersed community.

questions.fun_fact: Decentralized governance is crucial for the inclusive and equitable development of the APE ecosystem.
